foreignData.name: Waldläufer im Grenzland
foreignData.text:
Erstschlag
Du kannst dir zu jedem Zeitpunkt die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek anschauen.
Solange ein Gegner mehr Länder kontrolliert als du, kannst du Länderkarten oben von deiner Bibliothek spielen. (Du kannst auf diese Weise nur dann ein Land spielen, falls du in diesem Zug noch eines spielen darfst.)

foreignData.name: Exploradores de los límites
foreignData.text:
Daña primero.
Puedes mirar la primera carta de tu biblioteca en cualquier momento.
Mientras un oponente controle más tierras que tú, puedes jugar tierras desde la parte superior de tu biblioteca. (Puedes jugar una tierra de esta manera solo si te queda una jugada de tierra disponible.)

foreignData.name: Rangers de l'orée
foreignData.text:
Initiative
Vous pouvez regarder la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque à tout moment.
Tant qu'un adversaire contrôle plus de terrains que vous, vous pouvez jouer des terrains depuis le dessus de votre bibliothèque. (Vous ne pouvez jouer un terrain de cette manière que s'il vous reste une mise en jeu de terrain disponible.)

foreignData.name: Ranger di Frontiera
foreignData.text:
Attacco improvviso
Puoi guardare la prima carta del tuo grimorio in qualsiasi momento.
Fintanto che un avversario controlla più terre di te, puoi giocare terre dalla cima del tuo grimorio. (Puoi giocare una terra in questo modo solo se potresti giocarne una normalmente.)

foreignData.name: 境界のレインジャー
foreignData.text:
先制攻撃
あなたはいつでもあなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見てよい。
対戦相手１人が土地をあなたよりも多くコントロールしているかぎり、あなたはあなたのライブラリーの一番上から土地をプレイしてもよい。（これにより土地をプレイするには、あなたは土地プレイを残している必要がある。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・スカウト

foreignData.name: Patrulheiros dos Confins
foreignData.text:
Iniciativa
Você pode olhar o card do topo de seu grimório a qualquer momento.
Enquanto um oponente controlar mais terrenos que você, você poderá jogar terrenos do topo de seu grimório. (Você só pode jogar um terreno desta forma se tiver uma jogada de terreno disponível.)

foreignData.name: Лесничие Пограничья
foreignData.text:
Первый удар
Вы в любой момент можете посмотреть верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки.
Пока оппонент контролирует больше земель, чем вы, вы можете разыгрывать земли с верха вашей библиотеки. (Вы можете разыграть таким образом землю, только если у вас осталась возможность разыгрывания земли в этом ходу.)

name: Verge Rangers
originalText:
First strike
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
As long as an opponent controls more lands than you, you may play lands from the top of your library. (You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

rulings.text: Verge Rangers doesn’t allow you to play additional lands.

Verge Rangers lets you look at the top card of your library whenever you want (with one restriction; see below), even if you don’t have priority. This action doesn’t use the stack. Knowing what that card is becomes part of the information you have access to, just like you can look at the cards in your hand.

If the top card of your library changes while you’re casting a spell, playing a land, or activating an ability, you can’t look at the new top card until you finish doing so. This means that if you play a land from the top of your library and it has a replacement effect that requires you to make a decision (such as that of Temple Garden), you must make that decision without knowing the next card of your library.

text:
First strike
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
As long as an opponent controls more lands than you, you may play lands from the top of your library. (You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)
